reviewText: Final Warning by Grant Jeffrey is an outstanding book. Grant Jeffrey is a well known Christian author and TV personality.

Jeffery s is one of the most important figures on Christian prophecy. He has written one of the major fictional accounts of the Lords second coming and the End of Days but this is NOT fiction - this is real! This is a great DVD as well as a great work of Christian prophecy - very good to learn more about the coming End times. There is also a very compelling docudrama DVD Movie on the End of Days see: The Final Events DVD The movie is great because it shows CNN like news reports of what will happen during the End Days. Both are well recommended. These movies are fantastic good to show unbelievers as it is very powerfully convincing. I have used the Final Events more often because of the docudrama type style, but both are good if you are shopping by price only.
From the makers of " Left Behind" We love ordering from this company. Really Enjoy the movies..Get a copy now, you won't be sorry...
Its a good tool for those who ars in this stuff,its not wat i thought it was, but can be very useful to many.
This was released in 2008 so computers and such shown may look very outdated for younger viewers. But it will give you the general idea of the state of government, etc.

The film was a fear monger's delight. The real destruction does not come on the saints, but why should anyone think about what will happen to those who bring this end time offense against innocent by-standers? I'm getting the opposite from the Bible. Only the guilty need fear Him.

I ordered this at the same time as Shadow Government - both DVDs are by the same author Grant Jeffery. This contains much of the same information, but you can tell it was made years ago by the pictures of old computers. I also thought it was a little too "conspiracy theory" compared to the more recent release "Shadow government". (Although if you consider it as a prophecy at the time, the core ideas were spot on even if the grasp of the technologies was a bit off).  Also, this disc starts and ends with some movie trailers, unlike Shadow Government which is mostly material with a bit of "End of Times" from the book of revelations at the end. One interesting topic in Final Warning which I hadn't heard before was the seizure of citizen's money by law enforcement - no crime committed, no warrant, just the officer stating it was "suspicious activity" to carry around large amounts of cash. I did some online searching and there are a bunch of similar accounts from innocent civilians who had cash seized at airports or during traffic stops. I'm sure there are criminals out there carrying large cash too, but since when is it "suspicious" to carry large amounts of cash? When dealing with farmers to get fresh produce for your store for example... many farmers don't have time or resources to verify bank check information (or worry about bounced checks), and when operating from a roadside stand most of them do not have credit card machines. Going to an auction... coin show... there are many times when you might carry "large" amounts of cash on you. Anyhow, that one topic opened my eyes to some of the liberties that law enforcement officials are abusing to help directly or indirectly fund their activities.
Very informative !
was ok

If people would open their eyes and look at the world and see what is happening, it is all foretold in the bible. Jesus is coming soon and the government of this world is not your friend. They are taking all our freedoms one by one and we sleep in what they are really doing. Hold on for we are in for a rough ride, for the end times are really knocking at the door and we must choose which side we shall stand on. Jesus or Satan, One you are protected by the arms of Jesus, the other you are shutting Jesus out of your life and making the choice to serve this world. Wake up before its too late. America is going down hill morally and economically, spiritually. When we take God out of our lives we are no better than Sodom, and our fate will be the same.

This one hour program presents the same old new world order/Big brother society conspiracy theory we've seen so many times. While the DVD was released in 2008, it was first released on VHS in 1995 so it is very dated. Towards the end, host Grant Jeffrey says all of this was prophecied in the Bible and we should trust in Jesus. Certainly not worth spending money on.
I would receommend this product for those wondering about the future.  Know the signs of the times and prepare for what's ahead and know that God wants the best for his children.  Great movie!

This DVD by Grant Jeffrey is very informative about the end times and the coming World Economic System which will employ the use of an electronic chip implanted in a human beings right hand or forehead. Without the Mark of the Beast (as it is called), no one will be able to buy, sell or do any kind of activity without it. If one takes the mark then that person has chosen to follow the Mark of the Beast and will be doomed to damnation in Hell. Any person CHRISTIAN or not would enjoy this cutting edge documentary about what seems to be the future of our Economic world.

This focuses around the technology the government uses to spy on and keep track of its citizens.  Some of the technology in this dvd is dated, but just think about how quickly technology has advanced.  A good dvd to understand how big brother is advancing to control every aspect in your life.  One day in the future it will control you, unless you turn to GOD and escape the coming one world government.
This movie is a re-hash of old news.  I was very disappointed in it. I cannot recommend this movie to anyone.
I didn't actually buy this for myself, I got it as a gift for my brother-in-law before the election.  He tells me he really liked it so I am going on his say so! Same for Shadow Government!

Good video but is out dated.  It's from the mid 1990's.  The technology in the video like the cell phones are the same cell phone I had in 1995.  But the key here is the info provided in this video has pretty much come true and that info has a direct bearing on what is happening now!

This book is an 'eye opener' about how your social security number is being used, how the government can look at your PC without even having it in their posession or even if it is in your home and turned off. How people traveling with a lot of cash (legitimate purchases)are detained at airports, stopped, etc. and money confiscated without any charges brought against them.  Better heed the Final Warning. It could happen to you.

This video would of scared you if we were back in 1984. But we all now know that technology is here, hardly any of our info is private and big brother is always watching (mainly to figure out how to get $ from our poket into their's!). This movie was pretty lame, mostly because it was made a while back.

It has been said of late, "The government is our enemy."  This well researched and reported DVD documentary on how the American government since post WWII has been slowly eroding and lessening our Constitutional freedom and liberty as it pushes the nation closer toward socialism and it joining the global socialist one world government.  Pull up your socks, take a valium, and put on a teeth guard (prevent clenching) as you'll get so doggone angry about what this documentary reveals and how all it speaks of falls into line with final days Biblical prophecies.  This DVD is a must have for yourselves and to share with your church pastor, elders, family, friends, and especially those who vote for leftists, statists, socialists, and liberal progressive Democrats, and even left-leaning Republicans.  If you love your God/Jesus/Holy Spirit, the nation, Constitution, et al, get this DVD - NOW!

Yes, the information gathering is scary and national identification cards, GPS tracking, the NSA listening to phone calls, etc. is really happening and is of  great concern.  However, the "end of days" argument and christian-bias of this film takes away from it's credibility.  I expected a documentary about the real deal and got a propaganda film.

After seeing this movie, I checked out the websites and did some research about the organizations being targeted as the "secret conspirators" behind this information tracking and here's what I found....

The "Council of Foreign Relations" is essentially a research/news group that tracks world events and affairs that impact country-to-country relations around the world  [...].  "Philadelphia Two" is a group that wants the US Constitution to be changed through public initiatives, rather than through the US Congress [...].  "The World Constitution and Parliament Association" is, as is stated in the film, a group advocating a single world socialist government, but again with a rag-tag group of intellectuals and low-level power seekers for leaders.

These organizations are fringe groups and either apolitical and/or rag-tag groups with little power or powerful members.  This film is Christian-right propaganda with some facts thrown in for the "fear factor", in hopes of starting Armageddon, not raising awareness and the insight of its viewers.

This film not worth watching.

It's an on the edge of your seat truth to what the government doesn't want to tell the American people. It goes in detail on what is happening to people in our economy today and what will continue to happen until the return of Jesus Christ. If you love prophecy and you are a fan of Grant Jeffrey then this is for you.

As a result, the conservative class is shrinking and the number of liberals are growing. 2016 was the last year that America had a chance of getting a conservative elected for president. The churches have been infiltrated where a do good works and prosperity gospel is being preached rather than faith in Jesus Christ alone for forgiveness for our sins.

Wake up America before it is too late!!!

Although they deny it, the National Security Agency has been monitoring all phone calls globally for years. Unless America acts soon, a globalist agenda will be in place by 2020.
Wake up call !
